sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; function Portfolio() { const [activeFilter, setActiveFilter] = useState('All'); const projects = [ { id: 1, title: "Portfolio Site", description: "A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing my skills and projects with animated UI and smooth interactions.", role: "Full Stack Developer", tech: "React.JS | Vite | CSS3 | JavaScript", client: "Personal Project", category: "Web-App", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1467232004584-a241de8bcf5d?w=400&h=250&fit=crop&crop=center", githubUrl: "https://github.com/SAHIBAKHATOON/portfolio", liveUrl: "https://sahiba-portfolio.netlify.app", featured: true }, { id: 2, title: "Bulk Resume Scanner", description: "AI-powered web application that uses NLP and machine learning to match resumes with job requirements automatically.", role: "Python Developer", tech: "Python | Flask | SpaCy | Bootstrap | MySQL", client: "Personal Project", category: "Software", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551288049-bebda4e38f71?w=400&h=250&fit=crop&crop=center", githubUrl: "https://github.com/SAHIBAKHATOON/resume-scanner", liveUrl: "https://resume-scanner-demo.herokuapp.com", featured: true }, { id: 3, title: "Batch Management System", description: "Comprehensive educational management system with class scheduling, attendance tracking, and student performance analytics.", role: "Full Stack Developer", tech: "PHP | MySQL | Bootstrap | JavaScript | AJAX", client: "Personal Project", category: "Software", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1522202176988-66273c2fd55f?w=400&h=250&fit=crop&crop=center", githubUrl: "https://github.com/SAHIBAKHATOON/batch-management", liveUrl: "https://batch-management-demo.000webhostapp.com" }, { id: 4, title: "Event Weavers", description: "Modern event management platform with QR-based attendance tracking, real-time analytics, and seamless user experience.", role: "Full Stack Developer", tech: "PHP | MySQL | Bootstrap | QR Code API | JavaScript", client: "Internship Project", category: "Web-App", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1511795409834-ef04bbd61622?w=400&h=250&fit=crop&crop=center", githubUrl: "https://github.com/SAHIBAKHATOON/event-weavers", liveUrl: "https://event-weavers.vercel.app" }, { id: 5, title: "Gemini Clone", description: "AI-powered chat interface with advanced features, real-time responses, and modern UI similar to Google Gemini.", role: "Frontend Developer", tech: "React.JS | OpenAI API | CSS3 | JavaScript | Axios", client: "Personal Project", category: "Web-App", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1677442136019-21780ecad995?w=400&h=250&fit=crop&crop=center", githubUrl: "https://github.com/SAHIBAKHATOON/gemini-clone", liveUrl: "https://gemini-clone-react.vercel.app", featured: true }, { id: 6, title: "Dental Care", description: "Professional healthcare website for dental services with appointment booking, patient portal, and responsive design.", role: "Frontend Developer", tech: "React.JS | Bootstrap | CSS3 | JavaScript | LocalStorage", client: "Internship Project", category: "Web-App", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1629909613654-28e377c37b09?w=400&h=250&fit=crop&crop=center", githubUrl: "https://github.com/SAHIBAKHATOON/dental-care", liveUrl: "https://dental-care-react.vercel.app" }, { id: 7, title: "Book Rental System", description: "Comprehensive library management system with book tracking, user management, and automated notifications.", role: "Full Stack Developer", tech: "PHP | MySQL | Bootstrap | JavaScript | Email API", client: "Personal Project", category: "Software", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1481627834876-b7833e8f5570?w=400&h=250&fit=crop&crop=center", githubUrl: "https://github.com/SAHIBAKHATOON/book-rental-system", liveUrl: "https://book-rental-demo.000webhostapp.com" }, { id: 8, title: "Billing CRUD", description: "Advanced billing and invoice management system with CRUD operations, PDF generation, and financial reporting.", role: "Full Stack Developer", tech: "PHP | MySQL | Bootstrap | JavaScript | TCPDF", client: "Personal Project", category: "Software", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1554224155-6726b3ff858f?w=400&h=250&fit=crop&crop=center", githubUrl: "https://github.com/SAHIBAKHATOON/billing-crud", liveUrl: "https://billing-crud-demo.000webhostapp.com" } ]; const filteredProjects = activeFilter === 'All' ? projects : projects.filter(project => project.category === activeFilter); const handleProjectClick = (project) => { if (project.liveUrl) { window.open(project.liveUrl, '_blank'); } }; return (

My Projects

{filteredProjects.map(project => (
{project.liveUrl && ( )} {project.githubUrl && ( )}
{project.featured && (
Featured
)}

{project.title}

{project.description}

Role: {project.role}
Tech: {project.tech}
Client: {project.client}
{project.liveUrl && ( View Live )} {project.githubUrl && ( View Code )}
))}
); } export default Portfolio;
